message.body: Listening to I
True I'd give my right arm to keep. You safe from harm and true for u id move to Ecuador
It feels good to not relate to it
Not to tear up over it
That's what dating adults does for a person
I missed this text somehow...I unfortunately know nothing about adults
Somehow for the first time ever my boyfriend is a grown up
Congratulations
I mean, kinda
I thought Juan was
I miss u
I was just thinking about u!
What happened to us?
Right? You are one of the smartest ladies I know and one of my favorite people. I don't know why I never see u
Ditto. It's as tragic as each of us is
He is not attractive. She looked like a ceramics teacher
An 18th century ceramics teacher. Where did u see her?
I was meeting with 2 men in suits in a cafe in manyunk. I looked blankly at the nipple. They left
Jesus, of all people. Did they dare look at you?
'No. Van is losing it. Of course
I'm sure the nipple thought something smug about the disposition of her unborn child
Right.
God I hope it has fangs
You're hilarious
You are!
Confirmed that the nipple is pregnant
Gross
Imagine how soft she'll get
She will redefine soft
Remember how long shirts used to be?
And soft ...not like Stacy soft
So soft and thin
Hey. Did you ever resolve things with Erin?
Nah, we just never spoke again. It was weird
She's not happy
How can she be? It sux when your partner doesn't like you. But it doesn't help to take it out on the people that are nice to you
For sure
I wonder if they're still together
Probably. They wanted to have a baby even tho they hate one another
They have ni idea how stressful parenthood is
I know..it proves that she is crazy if she thinks having a baby will make things easier. Do you ever see Andrew?
We text now and then. I don't sew anyone
I kind of miss him, but they were both pretty judgey. Like I need them telling me I'm doing it wrong
I got it from him too.
He does not approve of multiple partners ha
Same with her
Right. So not feminists
Despite what they claim
And Ef that. Those were the most fun times of my life
They can both be so good and so challenging. And really, young and wild and free
Yeah. They could be terrifying
How far along were you when you found out you were pregnant?
Almost two months...i think. It's all such a blur now
A woman here was four months!
Need your address
I love your wedding invites!
How's Ella?
Your BC is welcome. It's really casual
Bf
Oh cool I will invite him
Happy bday tomorrow
Thanks!
What did u wear to your wedding?
It was like a spaghetti strap black dress a sheer layer. I got it at lord and Taylor, on floss of course.
How are your plans going?
OK. Can't decide wtf to wear
It's tough, Wes' sister had to get that dress the morning off because my stomach didn't fit the one we got
Is it going to be indoors? I don't really understand the magic gardens
It's inside.
That must have been gnarly. U were 5 months?
Six...my tits were impossible to do anything with. I'm so excited for your wedding!
I hope it's fun
Of course it will be, you guys are so fun
Tricia saw Ollie in south Philly. My phone won't send u the pic
He looks like a fish
Oh my god, I wish I could see. I bet he is so swollen
I had to send my wedding dress back
Oh no, why?
I'm freaking pregnant and fat
I know I have had my head up my ass with school, but I don't think I knew you were pregnant?!?!? How far?
2.5 effing months
Holllllly ####! You sound stoked, ha
Cool wedding pregnant
Yeah I feel you there..remember how wasted Wes and bubbles got?
And congratulations anyway!! I hope you have a girl this time
They were cross eyed. As I'm sure Juan will be
You can be just as pissed as I was.
Oh I will be
No, it will be fun still! Where did you get your dress?
Vagabond
Remember Judd 's ugly friend Bob?
Yes, although I had completely blocked him out
Guess who moved here?
To Philly? Who?!?
####### Ollie
No ########way! Where does he live?
South Philly with his trashy girlfriend
And Jenny saw Lori in Lancaster and said she's obese
Gross! And of course she is. Did they have any babies?
No. Lori thought it was appropriate to show up at Jenny 's mom with her coworker we used to work with at white dog
She's an idiot. Can you imagine her diet/cheap beer consumption?
Gross
Do u think she and Ian are still blissfully happy?
I don't know..how can you be happy hanging in that crew? Having to tolerate Johnny and Clint?
And if they are it's a lazy kind of happy..one that makes you obese
Johnny. I forgot about that hick
That's for the best
Ollie just walked by Tricia 's
Remember ems apartment and walking around the city laughing?
Gross I'm so glad I never see him
And feeling like maybe Lancaster could be OK... after we each got locked in the bathroom
It would've been beautiful. If only we'd been roommates
####### bubbles
I blame her for everything that's wrong in my life
Me too, I have for years
Aubrey is having her second baby tommorow
Yuck!
Some people make lanc work for them
She nailed it
She was better at roller derby than us
Much, much better
Make sure to tell me her second baby's name as soon as u know so I know my second baby's name
Haha, it's Minnie Moon
Seriously?
For reals
She'll be born with tatoos
Sailor Jerry tattoos
And a low cut shirt
Striped thigh highs
Did I tell you who's pregnant?
Who?!?!
Erin
Whoooooa. Are they stoked?
Yes. This was a planned pregnancy. Imagine that!
Weird, I thought pregnancy just happened
Me too
An on purpose baby?
Clint posted a link to Ollie's portrait website
No #######way. Is it awful?
It's weird. It's like pictures of people. He's a Philly artist now
I saw it. Bizarre
I know. It was chilling
How you doing mama?
Fat!!!
I can't wait to see you next weekend!
Me too. And meet the boyfriend
Wedding snow!
Nice
So I got an email from Erin all about pregnancy and labor and child rearing.
Jesus. Because she's an expert? I mean you do only have one kid, and he's kind of old
It was condescending as#####
I'm sure it was. She's good at that. Having a kid is going to effin blow her mind
Yeah
In the email she kept referring to "an average sized ten pound baby" and that I shouldn't let van's size influence me to medicalize another labor
What the hell is she going to do, give birth in the woods?
At f###### home. At their dirty south Philly home
Gross. In a tub?
A tiny tub
Totally. Andrew is going to have his work cut out for him.
He asked for it
He knew what he was getting into
Lets do something soon. Hang at our houses? We miss u
For sure. We miss u 2. Your boyfriend seems like the real deal
Yeah, he's pretty grown up for a dude. It's so weird
WHERE DOes Ella go to school
Samuel Powel
I'm gonna send the pickle there. Apparently we don't have to live in the neighborhood
It's true! We don't live in the neighborhood. Ella really likes it there
Is the school ethnicity diverse? I'm scheduling an appointment to visit
We should try to have lunch next weekend
I would love that..north or west?
And yes there is a lot of diversity, both ethnic and socio economic. In kindergarden Ella performed a spoken word about buffalo soldiers
Amazing.
North or south. Or Chinatown!
Ella would love Chinatown!
Pregnancy blows
Ugh..the bad memories have been erased from my mind. You should let me take you out for a pedicure next week : )
That would be awesome! My feet are an embarrassment
Mine too..I have old chipped nail polish from the summer still hanging on. Let me know when you can go, my treat!
Yay! Can u ever do Sunday mornings?
And, Tricia saw Ollie moping past her house with a broken arm!
Or I'm off the 21st!
I can do the 20th! Ella will be with floss.
And gross! Do you think it was skateboard related?
Absolutely and absolutely
Man child
She said he is really ugly
Ugh, he's like a piece of cured meat
I wonder if he notices that people think he's busted now
The looks of wonder have turned into looks of disappointment. I'm sure he could still be king in lanc
U ever hear anything about Eric sahd?
He was engaged to Liz the last I heard, but that was well over a year ago. Pretending to be normal
He loves getting engaged
So close to adult. It's weird that he's marrying his dead friends sister
Yeah. Ollie's friend married his brother 's wife after he killed himself. Lancaster
It's like some sort of archaic society
I heard Bianca is pregnant with her fourth. And Adrian told me Lori is considering kids
His wife kept talking to me about how great Lori was. I was speechless
Did she say "thank God for Lori? " Adrian must know we had a falling out. He gets awkward around the subject
She must have been irate that he came
Haha..yeah her invite must have gotten lost
She kept telling me things about their family and saying "we'll, Lori must have told you"
Really?! That's super weird. Isn't it weird that Lori still loves u and Amy but hates me?
It was awkward. And yeah I don't get it. I think she is embarrassed around me but she should be effin embarrassed around you too
She moved out of my house with out telling me
Some how we both betrayed her
Chubby b
Remember when people called me muggs?
Yes. Cutest nickname ever
So cute
Lori and em are probably still tight. They love snacking together
It's funny that em was the only one that used Lori to feel better about herself, and some how Lori hates us and is cool with her
Em never said anything to Lori about her embarrassing behavior because she didn't give a shit
And because it made her look like she had her shit together, even tho she was a raging alcoholic mess
Codependent slob
I heard a crazy story about bubbles
Tell me!!
So apparently she lost her job and got a new one in Tennessee. She sold her house and she and her mom drove all her shit down there. Ian was going to m
eet her down there in a month.
In her second day of work she left. Left all there shit and came back to Lancaster. Where she is now waitressing
High stress librarian lifestyle isn't for her I guess
What the ####?!!
That sort of######is totally acceptable in Lancaster
She loves Lancaster. And you and I both know she has an organic mental illness
Right. It was probably shocking to encounter real world expectations
They're all adult children
Let's move back to Lancaster . We'll do it the right way this time
I've thought about it so many times. I'd only go if you did. It's a baby wonderland.
I'm over Philly
Me too. Completely
The love is gone. I'm sick of being so poor so I can live in a city where I can't go out and do anything
Right. It's filthy too
I know. And it's so hard to get anything ####### done. I just spent the day in the county assistance office, feeling especially vulnerable
Are things OK with nate?
Yeah things are good. But we are still relatively new. I don't feel like I can lay everything that I go through on him.
How is married life?
It's boring. I feel crappy and tired and we don't see anyone or do much because we're really broke
Oh no, I'm sorry. We are the same. I keep thinking this is just something I'm going through right now, but really its my life.
Can you hang out tomorrow?
U work until 2 then we're free. Juan is working on a film all afternoon and evening
I am selling Girl Scout cookies in the am with Ella, but then floss is taking her overnight. Maybe I can come north?
I will take you out for lunch
That would rule! Van will be very excited
I would love to see that little dude
He's a giant. And a love bug
Two of my favorite traits in a guy
I'm so broken out by this pregnancy that van points at my face and looks at me with a worried look
Some asshole brought in donuts. Pregnant me cannot resist. I've already had 2
#### it, have another.
Where do you want to go tomorrow?
Craftwerk is close and good. So is loco pez or El Camino
Craftwerk has good creme brûlée, lets go there!
Ok
I'm really sick. We'll have to reschedule :(
Oh no, you poor thing. Let me know when you are feeling better. And if you want me to drop anything off for you, I can
Thanks. I didn't have my phone all day. Would have loved a delivery
Feeling any better?
No :(
How are you?
Finally better. Thanks for asking
Parenting with the flu sucked
Can u use a drill?
What do you mean..do you have a spare?
No, do u know how?
Oh! Yes
No hard, right?
No, do you need help with something?
Nah
Juan is no help
Reading Val's Facebook posts about expecting baby two. I'm literally the only non pregnant person I know right now
U need to start having less responsible sex
Aubrey was talking about how supportive her husband is. So annoying
She is THE worst!
I know, life is so unfair
How is she successful and happy?
Just raising her kids, running a placenta encapsulation practice and having a financially secure and supportive husband. The#####.
No! Is that really her business?!
That's really her business. Really.
I think her and Jackie downs work together or did
Freaking gross
I'll connect Erin with her. Women being obsessed with their vaginas is so manly
Erin is a perfect candidate for Lancaster. And I know, they are total breast feeding bullies
Can u image her there? How does she have friends all of a sudden? She didn't used to
She had that really boring friend who told me the dip I made for a pot luck was white trash, even though she used a powdered mix for her salad dressing. Still pissed about that
She actually said that? Wow. Let's try lunch again soon.
I know, so socially awkward, she couldn't help herself. And yes, lunch, please!
Can u ever get to manyunk for lunch during the week? We could hang kid free
I'm at bryn mawr five days a week. So ######.
Wanna quit my job and go to school. Think we would be homeless?
No, you would get financial aid! What do you want to go to school for?
We could be college girls together!
Erin emailed me again. I can't decide if she's being smug or if I'm an #######. I think I'm an #######
I'm bias, so I can't say, but you are probably not an########
Hole even
There's a picture of Clint and Mike musser on fb that took me back to 2007
Ugh, I saw it, wish I hadn't.
Occupational therapy maybe or fashion design!
Yes! Fashion! You have such good style! Just do it!
Christ. I'd love to but it seems so goddamn irresponsible. Why did I waste time when I was young and free?
I know, I feel the same. Why did we ever waste time in lanc?
And Juan is going for film, you should go for something you like. You've paid your social work dies
Dues
I snack like the chubbies in my office lately
Me too. My butt looks good but at the expense of the rest of my body.
Speaking of, Ella is selling Girl Scout cookies if you want some
Nothing looks good on me. We will take a box of onto butter cookies
Excellent choice, this will give us a reason to get our butts across town to visit
I also have a zit on my nose that has been there a month. Did I tell u it's another boy?
Oh my god, you are so out numbered in that house! Do you have names yet?
I know! I told u Griffin died, right?
Ralph ( my dad's name ) or maybe Maxwell
Oh no! No you didn't, I'm sorry. Old man..
We need to get rid of our cat pickle, he keeps attacking ella
I like Ralph, that is cute
Oh#####. Does she like the cat?
She used to, but she can't get too close to him. I think he has alpha issues. He only purrs and tries to cuddle with me, but treats her like a dick
How the hell does Erin know "tons" of pregnant women?
I can only guess from her boring job? Is she bullying you?
A little. It's presented as friendship. I'm confused
She's a bully friend, I'm sure she means well.
Is that where my confusion came in? At least this time I got to talk about how Juan and I are anti daycare
She can't help having an emotional reaction to people, so she gets irrationally mad, sad, offended when you aren't doing what she thinks you should
Are they doing day care? No judgement
Yes. No judgment
Erin seems like she would insist on being a SAHM just so she could hang out all day and then complain to Andrew about it. Again, no judgement
Right?! And to be so damn high and mighty about every other aspect of child care
And not care for the child. No judgment
Right, you are a bad mom if you don't breast feed, but it's fine to drop your kid in a pit for forty hours a week
And I've worked in daycare. They're not great
Nah.
I was so proud of myself for being nice to her at your wedding. She looked afraid
How do they get off being smug? They're just like us!
Like how now by default I'm Erin's friend. Not Andrew 's
They are! Erin just stopped going to grad school, wackadoodle
I know! I'm not allowed to be Andrews friend anymore, I make him laugh too much
She dropped out!? I didn't know that. Where does she work?
Like in the worst way, total entropy. She works in some really boring office, doing GIS something or other
What is gis?
Geo information system. Traffic patterns and shit I think
The ###### side of me wants to forward u her latest email.
Haha, whatever's makes you feel better..you don't want to pass that stress onto the baby
Remember Mick's bridal shower?
Ugh, I just remember everyone being mean to us and not giving us any food. ######g Kate
As if we didn't desperately need nourishment
Perpetually hungry
Somehow you got out of the wedding...I remember Ollie being so drunk
I was in Puerto Rico with Joe and nipple
Oh gross!
Ollie was glad I didn't ruin his time
Cuttin loose. I just had Ella and still had huge tits, felt fragile and had to go alone
Wes wouldn't go? Not cool enough?
Why wouldn't Wes go? So weird
Because of Lindsay and all of those people hating him
I remember leaving and my boobs were rock hard and painful and I was driving through Columbia crying. God
Ridiculous. Lancaster made sure that your marriage couldn't work
I know.. Lanc won
I still blame him for not leaving tho
And for being gross and smelling like BBQ sauce
I'm on break not week, I can meet you for lunch!
Ewwww. It's still his fault.
Awesome!! I can do any day but Thursday
Tuesday?
Perfect! Can u come to manyunk at noon?
I can! Tell me the place and I will be there!
Wanna meet at My office and go from there? #####################
Sure! Can't wait!
Yay!
We still getting lunch tomorrow?
Hell yeah! What time?
1230 at my office?
Sure sounds good
I'm at ###############. Call me and I'll come out. Can't wait!
Ok, so excited!
I'm here!
Be right out
Do u think Ollie will make the commute to o hallorans for St. Patty's day
He's probably already begun the pilgrimage on foot. Remember what a swampy trap that place was.
And bens girlfriend heather
Trolley haha
Was that his freaking name!?
Yeah, so gross
Ef off Tom!
How dare he
He's maddening
So is his success
Right. Life is so unfair
U should see this baby shower registry
Erin's? Is there a placenta blender?
Freaking practically. And everything is expensive as hell
Where the hell did they register?
Seriously, I can't even tell what it is. There's no advertising. Was Andrew always such a hippie?
Tricia just sent me a picture of Ollie walking down her street. He looks like a total Jack ass
I rember Andrew being absolutely anti hippy. Send me the pic!
I've been trying. My phone won't let me
When is the shower? I wonder what kind of people will be there?
￼Can u see it?
The 19th. According to the evicted 17 people accepted and 30 didn't respond
Oh my god yes. Look at those dreads
That sounds about right.
Doesn't he look like a wildabeast in the middle of the city?
Or big foot
He looks just like big foot, that posture. I can't believe he's not in his moms house
Was he ever cool? Or was I totally duped?
You were duped because he was so tall and big. I don't ever feel like I got to know him tho
Ha. Me either
Maybe no one ever will
His mom effed him up
My friend Laura is moving home from Honduras in the summer, and she needs a job, can I put her in touch with you? She's getting her masters in social work at penn
Totally.
Awesome, she's super cool and smart and a single mom
Im not sure what I can do but I'm happy to try to help her out. Is she just starting graduate school?
She is, in the fall. I figured you would know better than I do about organizations in Philly. Can I give her your email, since calling is kind of hard from Honduras?
Yup
What is your email?
Guess who broke up?
Tell me!
Nelson and alana
Wow..pretty epic. They're farm house/skate park
Their even. How did you find out? Em will probably try to date Nelson
Facebook. She will!
￼Yikes
Oh my god look at that thing
Which one!?
Ugh both, either. That is a weird looking baby
Did u know nipple had twins!?
No! They would do something creepy like that.they live so close to me yet I never ever see them
Their mutant eggs and sperm. I also heard Ollie moved here to be part of "the art scene "
Only someone living in Lancaster would consider Philly to have a lively art scene. Did I tell you Steve and Val moved back to Lanc?
Really?! Wow
Val wanted to raise their two babies close to her fam. In baby central
￼This is the first birthday party for Jackie downs kid. Saw it on Facebook
Ella has like one friend
Me too!
Oh yeah me too!!
I've been having nightmares about Jackie's kid 's birthday
I know. Last night I just stared at the picture. Nate told me I was obsessed
It's horrifying. He doesn't understand. Can you imagine how ostracized we would have been?
I know, he has no idea. Even with babies, we would've never been allowed in
We has so much suppressed damage from that town
They would've tried to turn our kids against us
He's such a good dude
And not that attractive really
Lancaster attractive is still pretty busted. It usually just means tall and or broad
Clint posted a picture of Ian on FB and he has thick dreds...Lori commented on how sexy he is gag
Vomiting in my mouth
Is Wes still on tour!?
No he's back, why?
His stupid f.b. posts
Gross
Yeah. He's living a 16 year gold's dream. Did I tell you how I ran into mena and he gave me an Ollie update?
No! What is new?
He's here for the art scene. Rents a room from Kevin and is still with the trashy girl who lives in Lancaster
Can we please hang while I'm on leave all summer?
Oh my god, please. When is that kid coming out?
June 25 at the latest. . . I hope
Oh man! Yes, let's make this golden summer
We're moving in July. A few blocks into the Hood.... a 4 bedroom. We could've lived the dream
Further north?
Four bedroom!!
I wish you were moving west
Further north. Into a palace. I wish we were too but we could only afford dumps out there
Wow that is amazing. I want a palace. Lancaster...
You should buy a place in our Hood. U could get a totally remodeled 2 b.r. house with a mortgage of 500 a month
What if we were neighbors? Too good to be true!
We could take turns getting the kids to school!
Yes! Have board game nights and drink sangria all summer
Ella can even start babysitting in a few years!
It's a great investment. U should ask floss for a down payment
I know, I keep thinking of it. I think I'm going to start looking. Where is your place?
U could get a house for like 4 grand down
Nate could fix it up, it would be incredible
Oh God! I wish I had a handyman!
You could get a place that doesn't need fixing. Seriously
That's unreal. I really should
I'm done with school, lets get lunch soon
Yes! Next week?
Yes, please! I have some books for van too
Awesome. If Monday or Tuesday works those are my best days
Either one is good..lets do Monday if that works
Monday 1230 in manyunk?
Sounds good, can't wait!!
Yay! Me too
Was it scary having a cesarean?
Sort of, but I think it was mostly anxiety about being a new parent. It happens so fast, it's more interesting than anything else
And the morphine drop after was nice
Happy birthday!!!
Thanks. Remember the one with Clint and the fire?
Is that the one where Ollie had a pool tournament?
No. That was the worst ever
